team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the dedicated professionals working to help you quit smoking
team.getInTouchDescription: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond...

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: The journey of building a smoke-free future
story.missionDescription: We are committed to helping people break free from tobacco addiction through innovative technology, supportive community, and evidence-based methods.
story.joinDescription: Let's work together to create a healthier world. We can help more people quit smoking and live better lives.

common.title: Empowering Your Journey to a
common.description: We're dedicated to helping people quit smoking through personalized support, community engagement, and evidence-based methods.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe everyone deserves the support and tools needed to break free from smoking. Our platform combines technology, community, and expertise to make your journey easier and more successful.

feature1.title: Health-First Approach
feature1.description: Evidence-based methods and personalized plans for successful quitting

feature2.title: Community Support
feature2.description: Connect with others on the same journey and share experiences

feature3.title: Expert Guidance
feature3.description: Professional coaches and medical experts to support your journey

feature4.title: Goal Tracking
feature4.description: Set and track your goals with detailed progress analytics

step1.title: Personalized Plan
step1.description: Get a customized quitting plan based on your habits and goals

step2.description: Access to professional coaches and medical experts

step3.description: Monitor your achievements and health improvements
